name: Tar Ghoul
description: The Tar Ghoul is a Medium undead creature, characterized by its ability to ignite itself and others, along with its strong physical attributes in Strength and Dexterity.
memorable: Its ability to vomit tar creates hazardous areas that can ignite, adding a tactical complexity to encounters.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting foes and control the battlefield with fire and tar.
relations: May be encountered with other undead creatures; serves as a formidable challenge to adventurers.
environment: Often found in areas where it can utilize its fiery abilities and surprise tactics.
strengths: Immunity to fire and poison damage; can paralyze foes with its claw attack.
weaknesses: Low Charisma and Wisdom make it less persuasive and perceptive than other undead.
attacks: Makes one bite and one claw attack, with the potential to paralyze non-elf foes.
most_powerful_ability: Vomit Tar creates burnable tar zones that ignite and deal ongoing fire damage.
skills: Has average perception skills, with a +2 modifier indicating capability in noticing surroundings.
additional_information: Immune to charm, exhaustion, and poisoned conditions.
Dual capabilities with fire and melee attacks.
Uses fire strategically to control combat fields.
Moves quickly to engage or escape in battle situations.

medium undead with fire manipulation abilities
